DataElement.preferredName: FIQOL 29 Past Month Have Felt So Sad, Discouraged, Hopeless, or Had So Many Problems Wondered if Anything was Worthwhile Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation, during the past month, about whether they have felt so sad, discouraged, hopeless, or had so many problems that they wondered if anything was worthwhile, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fecal Incontinence Quality of Life Scale Past 30 Days Have Felt So Sad, Discouraged, Hopeless, or Had So Many Problems Wondered if Anything was Worthwhile Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 29-question quality of life scale developed to address issues related specifically to fecal incontinence._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about whether an individual felt so sad, discouraged, hopeless or had so many problems that they wondered if anything was worthwhile._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from (1) Extremely to (6) Not at all.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is in extreme agreement with something.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is in extreme agreement with something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match NCIt. mc 9/8/20

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ReferenceDocuments.name: During the past month, have y
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past month, have you felt so sad, discouraged, hopeless, or had so many problems that you wondered if anything was worthwhile?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
